# Homework assignment

[^labinfo]

There is one assignmnet that will be due near the half way mark of the course. 
The assignment will ask you to explore a specific gene, gene product or pathway using
the  literature and bioinformatic databases.

Assignment submission is always electronic and via  __OWL__. Please see the OWL course website for more details.

# Project

There is a project that will be due near the end of the semester. The project will involve
a deeper, more thorough investigation of a specific hallmark of cancer. This typically
involves an exposition of a full chapter from Weinberg or from a specific paper from the
literature.
